about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: A developer in constant evolution
about.bio: I got into programming drawn by the freedom to work from anywhere. Over time, I discovered something more valuable: the ability to turn an idea into something real. I'm not just talking about writing code — I'm talking about sitting down with you, understanding what you need, and building something that actually works in your day-to-day. Turning a client's concern into a tool they use every morning is what makes me love this work.

closeness.title: Closeness
closeness.description: I'm involved from start to finish. I don't vanish after a quote.

honesty.title: Honesty
honesty.description: If something's not viable, I'll tell you early. No surprises.

clarity.title: Clarity
clarity.description: I explain everything without jargon. Your project, your decisions.

robustness.title: Robustness
robustness.description: I analyze before I build. Nothing left to chance.

scalability.title: Future vision
scalability.description: I build thinking about tomorrow, not just today.

commitment.title: Commitment
commitment.description: Your project is my project. I pour into every detail.

hobbies.title: Outside of code
hobbies.description: I play the violin, play padel weekly, and work out several times a week. My next pursuit: boxing.

process.title: How I Work
process.subtitle: What working with me looks like

understand.title: Understand
understand.description: Before touching anything, I sit down with you. I listen to what you need, ask about what's unclear, and make sure I understand the root problem.

plan.title: Plan
plan.description: With everything clear, I lay out a concrete plan: what will be done, in what order, and what you'll receive at each stage. No surprises, no fine print.

develop.title: Develop
develop.description: I build step by step, showing you real progress so you can share your feedback along the way. No waiting months to see a result.

deliver.title: Deliver
deliver.description: I don't just hand you a product and walk away. I deliver everything documented, explain how it works, and stay available for whatever you need after.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind?
contact.description: I'm available for freelance projects, collaborations, or full-time positions. If you have an idea or need help with your project, reach out.
